thread.title: Little Mix’s Perrie Edwards reveals new cropped blonde locks and goes make-up free for sultry Instagram selfie
thread.title_full: Little Mix’s Perrie Edwards reveals new cropped blonde locks and goes make-up free for sultry Instagram selfie

author: tpearce
title: Little Mix’s Perrie Edwards reveals new cropped blonde locks and goes make-up free for sultry Instagram selfie
text:
Comments PERRIE Edwards has shown off a brand new style with a tousled shoulder-length hairdo. 
The Little Mix star posted a series of new selfies on her Instagram where she cut back her make-up for a fresh-faced look – but still couldn’t resist a Snapchat filter or two in the collection. Instagram 4 Perrie Edwards looks completely different as she shows off her new ‘do 
Ahead of her new tour with the band, Perrie has got rid of her long blonde hair and instead has gone for a more rocker chic ‘do that looks effortlessly cool. 
The new snip comes just days after her bandmate Jesy Nelson has revealed she has also had her hair done and gone for a shorter look as well. Getty Images - WireImage 4 The star has chopped off her luscious long locks 
Little Mix are now heading over to the States to continue their worldwide domination by supporting songstress Ariana Grande on her Dangerous Woman tour– starting with a performance in Las Vegas tonight. 
During the US tour they will also be performing at New York’s iconic Madison Square Garden. Little Mix show off their moves in sexy new music video for Touch 
The time away has probably come as a welcome relief to Perrie – who appears to have split up from her new footballer beau, Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain. 
Perrie was spotted seemingly having an argument with her Arsenal playing other half Alex as they left Drama nightclub in London at 3.30am. Latest from TV & Showbiz Bianca Gascoigne kisses Jamie O'Hara while Jessica Cunnginham flashes her underwear at CBB afterparty 'MUM'S GOT A BIGGER PAIR OF LUNGS' Voice star says she could never follow in Page 3 mum Linda Lusardi's footsteps as she 'doesn't have the assets' status cloned Rick Parfitt's dying wish almost wrecked after widow he wrote out of will 'took' his treasured axe and a replica had to be made for funeral new skids on the block Top Gear bosses unveil new trailer to kick off campaign to make Matt LeBlanc, Rory Reid and Chris Harris show's new golden trio 'SO IN LOVE' Alex Jones reveals she is 'obsessed' with her newborn son as she shares sweet photograph of his tiny hand Awkward Celebrity Big Brother blunders as it announces Coleen Nolan had been EVICTED as she's crowned the winner 'Some people just have stardust' Gabby Logan says Usain Bolt is even more impressive in real life look who's back Coronation Street - Is Helen Flanagan's character Rosie Webster part of a drugs cartel? 'Make Mondays easier' Use your Sunday leftovers to make Jamie Oliver's delicious Singapore Noodles BACK TO BEING BARRISTER Judge Rinder will resume his legal eagle role on ITV on Monday according to his glamorous courtroom assistant Michelle Hassan Carters in crisis EastEnders - The only person Mick feels he can rely on right now is Whitney... sordid secrets Hollyoaks - Diane's back at last...but who's her mystery man? 
Stepping out in a shoulderless black dress, the Shout Out To My Ex hitmaker looked as though she may have wished she had a jacket as temperatures in the capital plummeted to below freezing. 
Alex was seen standing opposite her with his hands in his pockets and the conversation ended with the pair of them heading off in separate directions. Instagram 4 Jesy has also had a trip to the hairdressers as the group prepare to go on tour 
Suspicion was raised further after deleting a photograph on Instagram she posted of the hunk cuddling her beloved dogs just weeks ago . 
Eagle-eyed fans noticed the missing pic, however there’s no other evidence to suggest they have split, and they’ve previously appeared very happy together. 
The couple, both 23, have tried to keep their romance away from the spotlight since The Sun Online broke the news in November. PA:Press Association 4 The Little Mix girls are now heading out on tour 
However, shortly before posting the picture, an eagle-eyed fan snapped them sitting in a cafe in Hadley Wood, North London. 
A source said: “Perrie wants to keep her love life private and also doesn’t want to be regarded as a stereotypical football WAG. 
“It’s early days and they’re still getting to know each other so it’s unlikely her stance will change. 
“Alex fully supports her as he too wants to be known as a footballer, not for dating a pop star.” 
They haven’t been spotted together since their apparent public spat.
